review: My treatment is going on progressively, while I am keeping a regular follow up with the scans and medications as prescribed. By completing the course of three months, I am extremely happy with what I have acquired as results and also with the doctor. She has given complete guidance along with the needful information. Other than the waiting period, everything has been perfect so far. It may take more than 30 minutes even if the appointment is reserved in advance. Despite that, I am happy with the overall experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I started visiting Dr. Hemanandini Jayaraman before planning my pregnancy and the mandatory tests and the medicines which she prescribed was really helpful. 
Excellent doctor. She is very positive in her attitude *** ***** **** *** ********* ***** *** **** ********* ********* which are required. 
It was my 3rd C section &  doctor gave us full support .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Hemanandini is amazing, she takes her time to explain concepts and makes sure you've understood everything. She is patient and is open to answering all questions. Her approach is friendly and open. I love her non judgemental approach and understanding and the fact that she takes her time with each patient.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I booked this appointment through practo. Firstly, the clinic was wrongly mentioned. I went to apoorva diagnostic clinic and then was told the doctor sits at apoorva hospital whic is 1.5 kms away. I called the hospital to confirm they said the doctor is on leave! but there's another gynac on call who can see me. So I walked the 1.5 kms to reach the hospital. Upon reaching i was told there is no gynac available! is this a joke to you guys?Also, if a particular doctor is on leave then why isn't practo doing its due diligence and updating their app??? Why is the doctor also making slots available at practo? Most horrible experience and half a day gone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr hemanandini is a great doctor. she did my pregnancy check ups and c section. I have heard horrifying stories and experiences about c section but thanks to dr hemanandini, I never faced a single issue post c section till date(1 year since surgery). one more good thing I want to mention is that Dr hemanandini does not recommend unnecessary medicines and lab tests unless really required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
She is nice and kind and understands the situation properly, giving the right advice for treatment. She remembered my treatment story and gave a practical solution forward.
I am yet to get the final procedure done from her but I have a high trust on her, the way she is dealing with the same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Hema has been a very positive and a friendly doctor. I have been consulting her for quite sometime and always received satisfactory consultation and advise from her. Now, will be getting my normal delivery done under her supervision in this month itself.

From four months I am visiting her for my maternity consultations. Since I book online appointments, the consultation usually happens instantly without waiting much. Dr. Hemanandini is very caring. She is giving all the essential advice. I even follow up through phone calls. She is always available at the time of need. Along with all the necessary scans and tests, everything is going fine so far. I am very happy with the doctor's guidance.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Good thing about doctor was , she din recommend any costly tablet or too many tablets .
i hate taking tablets , i was happy i had to take only 2 tablet before and after delivery also .
during my delivery doctor was available on time like early morning .

Thanks Doctor.

With respect to treatment, I have achieved an extreme level of satisfaction and I am very happy with the doctor. Her strategic assessment and the way she execute the analysis is perfect. She refer test reports as per the requirement. The schedule arrangement and hospitality is also good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife visited Dr Hemanandini madam for pregnancy, initial we are not getting a results then we consulted  her and she suggested the steps with clear explanation.   After the pregnancy's confirmation she asked to make only required test and scans and asked to visit only once in a month. She did not describe any unwanted test or medicine and she was available on phone calls.
In last week we are blessed with baby girl via C 0-Section done by madam, she tried to make it via normal delivery but my wife did not get pain even after 39.4 weeks. She prescribed min medicine and we are happy with Dr friendliness and cooperation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** *********** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******.She asks you to do only the required tests and explains the situation in details.She is very friendly and warm.I was diagnosed with cyst in one of my ovary and polyp in my uterus.I was told by other doctors to go for removal of cyst from ovary along with polypectomy to get the polyp removed.Few even suggested there may be complications for me while trying to get pregnant.Thats when I thought of taking a second opinion and visited Dr Hemanandini.She suggested me to do only the polypectomy and prescribed medicines which not only cured my ovary cysts but also helped me conceive naturally.She has also done my c section recently and helped me deliver my baby.I am very satified and grateful to her and highly recommend her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had bad experience with dr. Hemanandini jayaraman / OBG.
I was consulting for my first pregnancy. I went at 9 months, 2-3 times with  pain. but she told this is false pain. Come with more pain which u can't even tolerate or sit like that she told for normal delivery. *** ** *** ******* ******** *
       I went with labour pain   and I got admitted. They told some reason and choosen emergency C section. And after that I came to know my baby taken motion inside and had  problem and admitted NICU.

     I don't recommend her, when we asked about this problem she was shouting and not allowing us to speak also, she is arguing its u r problem like that. Bad experience with her.

But manipal hospital service, staff , other facilities are v good.
Doctor was friendly and explained me all the options. She asked me to decide and come  back and she will do it as per my needs.

Sorted doctor with quick explanation & solution provided. I loved my visit & interaction with Dr. Hemanandini
